sentences.en: a map showing the topography of the island
An exaggerated vertical scale is useful, however, when dealing with low dips and subdued topography.
sentences.cn: 但在倾角小,地形平缓的情况下,放大垂直比例尺是有用的.

sentences.en: Anomalies due to polarization can be so much larger than those resulting from topography.
sentences.cn: 极化产生的异常会远远大于地形引起的异常.

sentences.en: East the topography Gao Xidi, east, south, north three around a mountain.
sentences.cn: 地势东高西低, 东 、 南 、 北三面环山.

sentences.en: Factors controlling weathering: climate, topography, rock type and structure.
sentences.cn: 风化作用因素: 气候 、 地形 、 岩石类型和构造.

sentences.en: Geology A marked change in topography such as a fault or valley.
sentences.cn: 地形上的显著变化,如断层,深谷.

sentences.en: Landforms of topography, vegetation and climate are influential factors in formation of soils.
sentences.cn: 地形或地形学 、 植被和气候都是对土壤形成有影响的因素.

sentences.en: Nexus - information on refractive and cataract surgery, corneal topography and topographers.
sentences.cn: 屈光矫正,白内障手术, 角膜地形图的有关信息.

sentences.en: Obviously, such topography makes the construction of railroads, highways, airports, and cities easier.
sentences.cn: 显然, 这样的地形有利于建筑铁路 、 公路 、 机场和城市.

sentences.en: The motion of shallow waters is strongly dependent on the bottom topography.
sentences.cn: 浅水运动强烈地依赖于底部地形.

sentences.en: The parks should be adapted to the local topography.
sentences.cn: 公园应该顺应当地的地形.

sentences.en: The region under investigation is extremely in homogeneous in topography.
sentences.cn: 所研究的地区在地形上很不均匀.

sentences.en: The technology of surface topography modeling and simulation for ultra - precision diamond turning .
sentences.cn: 超精密 车削工件表面形貌形成的仿真建模技术.

sentences.en: The topography of the river's basin has changed significantly since the floods.
sentences.cn: 该河流域的地形自洪水以来发生了显著变化。

sentences.en: Topography also influence coastal currents and circulation in Bo Sea.
sentences.cn: 地形对于浅海区的沿岸流和渤海环流也有着重要的影响.
